tasks.label: Run project with Makefile or Docker Compose
tasks.command: if [ -f Makefile ]; then make up || make start || make run; elif [ -f docker-compose.yml ]; then docker-compose up --build; elif [ -f docker-compose.dev.yml ]; then docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up --build; else echo 'No recognized entry point (Makefile or docker-compose) found.'; fi
